channel.title: Skill on Blog of Kai
channel.description: Recent content in Skill on Blog of Kai

item.title: PhD transferable skills
item.description: Here are examples of PhD skill sets and ways to describe them by University of Michigan.

item.title: Writing your dissertation - working with your supervisor
item.description: Source Your supervisor Before you begin your dissertation, it is highly likely you will be assigned a supervisor to oversee your progress from first steps to completion.

item.title: Rich Content -- Bult-in Shortcode
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.
